home.title: Home Page
home.description: This is the home page of our app.
home.instruction: To search for a specific date, enter a date from 16/06/1995 onwards.
home.instruction2: Or if you want to sort the current random items by date, choose the order.

footer.legend: Images and data provided by NASA. Powered by React and Tailwind CSS.
